# Software {.unnumbered}

Examples were calculated in `r R.Version()$version.string` with an effort to use the most recent versions of R packages.

The R packages used in this book include (in alphabetic order):

* `car` [@R-car]
* `dplyr` [@R-dplyr]
* `fma` [@R-fma]
* `forecast` [@R-forecast]
<!-- * `ggfortify` [@R-ggfortify] -->
* `ggplot2` [@R-ggplot2]
* `lmtest` [@R-lmtest]
* `patchwork` [@R-patchwork]
* `pracma` [@R-pracma]
* `randtests` [@R-randtests]


```{r}
#| echo: false
# Automatically create a bib database for R packages
knitr::write_bib(c(
    .packages(), 'base', 'knitr'
    ,'car' # l01
    ,'dplyr' # l01
    ,'fma' # l03
    ,'forecast' # l01, l03    
    # ,'ggfortify' # l01
    ,'ggplot2'
    ,'lmtest'
    ,'patchwork'
    ,'pracma' # l03
    ,'randtests' # l01
), 'refPackages.bib')
```
